entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 4:26PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG SOUTHEASTERLY WINDS THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY... Strong southeasterly winds have started developing across the southern part of the Alaska Peninsula ahead of a front associated with a Bering low. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 4:26PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG SOUTHEASTERLY WINDS THIS EVENING AND TUESDAY... Gusty southeasterly winds up to 60 mph will persist through this evening as a front associated with a strong Bering low moves through the region.
